q_en: What is the production progress of the Dress ordered by Emily? Please represent it in percentage.

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'Emily';
steps.description: Retrieve the customer ID for the customer with the name "Emily"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM orders WHERE user_id = 3;
steps.description: Retrieve the order IDs for orders placed by the customer "Emily"

steps.sql: SELECT p.id FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE pt.description = 'Dress';
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs for products of type "Dress"

steps.sql: SELECT op.id FROM order_product op WHERE op.order_id IN (3, 11) AND op.product_id IN (5, 13, 21, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the order product IDs for the "Dress" products ordered by "Emily"

steps.sql: SELECT SUM(op.number) FROM order_product op WHERE op.id IN (11, 12, 13, 14);
steps.description: Retrieve the total quantity of "Dress" products ordered by "Emily"

steps.sql: SELECT SUM(st.completed_number) FROM sewing_tasks st WHERE st.order_product_id IN (11, 12, 13, 14);
steps.description: Retrieve the total completed quantity of sewing tasks for the "Dress" products ordered by "Emily"

steps.sql: SELECT (SUM(st.completed_number) / SUM(op.number)) * 100 AS production_progress FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE op.id IN (11, 12, 13, 14);

response:
Hello there! üòÑ Let's take a look at the production progress for the "Dress" products ordered by Emily. Here's a breakdown of the progress in percentage:

| Product Type | Customer | Production Progress (%) |
|--------------|----------|-------------------------|
| Dress        | Emily    | 85.19%                  |

Emily's dresses are coming along nicely, with a production progress of 85.19%! üéâ Keep an eye out for the final touches! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! üòä
